Cerebral Palsy (CP) Fundraiser

Unfortunately, CP is incurable, however, some of the symptoms can be managed to ensure better quality of life. Time is very important when it comes to the treatment, the earlier it is started, the better of success it has.

donate Share Report pdf

Project

Completed
Country Ukraine
Deadline Jan 13, 2023
Amount $ 80,000.00 / $ 100,000.00

Select payment method

Select payment method

Donation total $10.00
Cerebral palsy remains one of the most common disabilities among Peolples.

New skill

As of today, we are collecting funds for children with CP. Every donation is a new skill for a child and a sigh of relief for the parents. We urge you to support children with CP on their developmental journey!

Join us and help this world! Life&Peace

Project

Our aspiration is to make the world a better place with you on our side!

donate

Medical attention

Medical attention and physical therapy are required as often as three times a month in order to keep the affliction from progressing further.

Without that the child may be facing a serious risk to their health and even life. It is terrifying to watch your sick child suffer, unable to help over the lack of finance. That is why we are asking you to help. Medical attention and physical therapy are required as often as three times a month in order to keep the affliction from progressing further.

Without that the child may be facing a serious risk to their health and even life. It is terrifying to watch your sick child suffer, unable to help over the lack of finance. That is why we are asking you to help.
